title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Asra Nomani | 5/13/22
description:
Pat Gray joins to discuss how companies like Netflix and BlackRock are reeling in their woke policies. Bill O'Reilly joins to discuss the ongoing supply chain crisis and how Biden is putting America last. The Federalist senior contributor Asra Nomani joins to expose the Washington Post and the ACLU's involvement in helping Amber Heard attack her ex-husband Johnny Depp.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
